name: Elevate
headerSeo: The Honda Elevate, priced at Rs. 10.99 lakh (ex-showroom), looks sleek and that smoothness and reliability is also found in its 1.5-litre petrol engine mated to six-speed MT or CVT. It gets ADAS, six airbags, and has scored five-star in JNCAP crash safety ratings. It is decently practical with a spacious cabin and a 458-litre boot.
pros:
• Is a large SUV and is bigger in dimensions than some of its segment rivals.
• It benefits from the safety of six airbags and ADAS features.
• The infotainment offers wireless smartphone integration options.
• Gets the option of either a six-speed manual or CVT gearbox.
• The large boot space of 458 litres boosts practicality.
cons:
• The Elevate does not have an NCAP rating.
• There are no other engine options other than the single petrol engine.
• It lacks new-age features like a panoramic sunroof or heads-up display.
description:
• The 119bhp/145Nm 1.5-litre i-VTEC petrol engine is impressively quiet and vibration-free at idle.
• This naturally aspirated engine provides a predictable power delivery with strong low- and mid-range torque.
• There’s adequate power, making it suitable for city driving and highway cruising.
• It has a six-speed manual transmission offering smooth clutch travel and a satisfying gearshift action.
exteriorDesign:
• The 119bhp/145Nm 1.5-litre i-VTEC petrol engine is impressively quiet and vibration-free at idle.
• This naturally aspirated engine provides a predictable power delivery with strong low- and mid-range torque.

faqs.question: Q: What is the avg ex-showroom price of Honda Elevate base model?
faqs.answer: The avg ex-showroom price of Honda Elevate base model is Rs. 11.05 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 140388, insurance premium of Rs. 50718 and additional charges of Rs. 500.

faqs.question: Q: What is the avg ex-showroom price of Honda Elevate top model?
faqs.answer: The avg ex-showroom price of Honda Elevate top model is Rs. 16.64 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 212318, insurance premium of Rs. 74181 and additional charges of Rs. 500.

faqs.question: Q: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Honda Elevate?
faqs.answer: The company claimed mileage of Honda Elevate is 15.31 to 16.92 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 14 to 14.94 kmpl in the real world.

faqs.question: Q: What is the seating capacity in Honda Elevate?
faqs.answer: Honda Elevate is a 5 seater car.

name: Amaze
headerSeo: The third generation of the Honda Amaze has a starting price of Rs. 8.19 lakh (ex-showroom). This sub-four-metre sedan gets 1.2-litre petrol engines mated to a five-speed manual and CVT transmission options. It also features a Level 2 ADAS suite and 8-inch infotainment display. It is an E20 fuel compliant model.
pros:
• The sharp design is similar to the Honda City.
• It has Level 2 ADAS and other modern features.
• The cabin is adequately spacious and comfortable.
• The boot space is sufficient for most requirements.
cons:
• Missing key features like ventilated seats and a sunroof.
• Tall people can find the rear headroom restrictive.
description:
• In terms of features, the new Amaze gets a Level 2 ADAS suite, a feature not offered by any of its rivals at the moment.
• The model also boasts automatic climate control, larger touchscreen infotainment system, and touch capacitive controls.
• There are a range of charging options, including USB Type-A, wireless charger, and USB Type-C ports.
exteriorDesign:
• The new Amaze features six airbags, ABS with EBD, reverse parking sensors, seatbelt reminder system, and a speed alert system as standard.
• It is also equipped with TPMS, ESP, hill hold control, and more.
comfortConvenience:
• In terms of features, the new Amaze gets a Level 2 ADAS suite, a feature not offered by any of its rivals at the moment.
• The model also boasts automatic climate control, larger touchscreen infotainment system, and touch capacitive controls.
• There are a range of charging options, including USB Type-A, wireless charger, and USB Type-C ports.

faqs.question: Q: What is the avg ex-showroom price of Honda Amaze base model?
faqs.answer: The avg ex-showroom price of Honda Amaze base model is Rs. 7.45 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 89147, insurance premium of Rs. 41590 and additional charges of Rs. 500.

faqs.question: Q: What is the avg ex-showroom price of Honda Amaze top model?
faqs.answer: The avg ex-showroom price of Honda Amaze top model is Rs. 10.00 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 126680, insurance premium of Rs. 47615 and additional charges of Rs. 500.

faqs.question: Q: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Honda Amaze?
faqs.answer: The company claimed mileage of Honda Amaze is 18.65 to 19.46 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 17.07 to 18 kmpl in the real world.

faqs.question: Q: What is the seating capacity in Honda Amaze?
faqs.answer: Honda Amaze is a 5 seater car.

faqs.question: Q: What are the dimensions of Honda Amaze?
faqs.answer: The dimensions of Honda Amaze include its length of 3995 mm, width of 1733 mm and height of 1500 mm. The wheelbase of the Honda Amaze is 2470 mm.
